H0.text: Who had a hit in 1955 with Rock Around the Clock. Bill Haley and His Comets

H1.text: Who had a hit in 1955 with Rock Around the Clock. Elvis Presley

H2.text: Who had a hit in 1955 with Rock Around the Clock. Chuck Berry

H3.text: Who had a hit in 1955 with Rock Around the Clock. Saddlemen

A4.text: Bill Haley and the Comets performed 'Rock Around the Clock' in an a cappella and a lip-synched version on the NBC television program Texaco Star Theater hosted by Milton Berle on May 31, 1955.

A5.text: Elvis Presley recorded the song in 1956, combining Haley's arrangement with Turner's original lyrics, but his version was not a substantial hit.
